title: New: Shoes and Socks Off – Tork Sport
content:
It’s been nearly two years since Shoes and Socks Off, aka one Toby Hayes, released a full-length record.

And so it’s very, very (very) pleasing to announce that on May 14th, Miles Of Mad Water will be available via both Big Scary Monsters and Father Figure Records.

Lead single Tork Sport brings Hayes’ oft-professed (but not so often easily heard) Radiohead influences to the fore, its skittering beats and gorgeous swells overlaid by the man’s characteristic oblique/tender lyrical tradeoffs. The track’s an obvious departure from 2010’s six-string-centric (and fecking badass) Robin Hood Waiter Champion, but Hayes has never been one to toe the line, and what the rest of the record’s going to be like is just freakin’ killing me.

Put your hands together for the positive recluse.
